thread.title: The Corrs are back with wistful new single 'Bring on the Night' - Music
thread.title_full: The Corrs are back with wistful new single 'Bring on the Night' - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Lewis Corner
title: The Corrs are back with wistful new single 'Bring on the Night' - Music
text: Fans of The Corrs rejoice: the Irish band have premiered their first piece of new music in over a decade.The group have released comeback single 'Bring on the Night' after debuting it on BBC Radio 2 this morning (October 19).Keeping in line with their popular back catalogue, the track is a wistful affair with a rousing chorus and flutters of Irish folk music.It heads up their new studio album White Light, which will follow on November 27 before they embark on a headline tour of the UK and Ireland. Â© Facebook / The CorrsThe Corrs The Corrs have spent most of 2015 in London working on their new record, which will be the follow-up to 2005's Home.The band have sold more than 40 million records worldwide during their career, and their 1997 album Talk on Corners went nine times Platinum in the UK alone.The full dates for The Corrs' headline arena tour are as follows:January 19 - Birmingham, Genting ArenaJanuary 20 - Cardiff, Motorpoint ArenaJanuary 22 - Liverpool, Echo ArenaJanuary 23 - London, The O2January 24 - Manchester, Manchester ArenaJanuary 26 - Glasgow, Hydro ArenaJanuary 28 - Dublin, 3 ArenaJanuary 29 - Belfast, The SSE Arena
